name: Party Parrot Palooza
description:
Swap the party parrots before they overwhelm you! Click on a parrot and then an empty space to move it there! Put parrots next to like parrots! PARTY!

***Warning this has flashy lights and dance music***

Made for GGJ 2017

Music: http://www.dl-sounds.com/royalty-free/power-up/
Parrots: http://cultofthepartyparrot.com/
Sound Effects: https://www.freesound.org/people/Reitanna/
Made in St. Louis Logo: http://stlgamedev.com/madeinstl/
